title: What’s the Splitter?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Your items may get split in two, but your fun will double!

The handy Splitter feature allows you to divide an item into two from the previous level, making it easier to fulfill your orders and earn rewards. If you accidentally split an item, simply click on the ‘undo’ button to reverse it.

You can earn Splitters through game activities like events, daily task missions, level upgrades, and more, so keep playing to increase your chances.

✈️ Travel Tip: Feeling like your item is a bit too advanced? You can use more than one Splitter to keep breaking it down until it's just right for you to complete your order. 👌

🚧 Heads Up, Travelers: While this trusty Splitter is magnificent at helping you complete orders, it may not work on the unique items released during special events. We just wanted you to keep that in mind the next time something brand new comes to town! 🤠

Let’s make like a banana and split!

title: Where can I store my Producers?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Want to free up more space on your board? The Producers Inventory is a great way to do that!

The Producers Inventory is there to store the max-level Producers you’re not currently using. More slots will unlock 🔓 as you level up ⬆️.

- If your max-level Producer is already a part of your Items Inventory, it will automatically get moved to the Producers Inventory when its slot becomes available.
- If the Producer is on your main board, it will stay there until you drag it to the Producers Inventory.
- If you ever need the Producer back from your inventory, just tap on it to bring it back to the main board - super easy!

Between the Producers Inventory and inventory for items and tools, there’s no need to worry about overcrowding! 🙌

title: How can I refresh the items in my store?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Have your eye on a special item? Take a look at our Store to see if it’s there. 👀

The third tab of Travel Town’s store has items that you can purchase using your Diamonds. 💎

Couldn’t find the item you are looking for? We got you covered! You can refresh the Store in exchange for Diamonds and you will be able to see new items to help you reach your goals. 🙌

💨 Run to check out this amazing feature. Good luck and keep on merging!

title: Sticker Collection
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Everyone needs some travel memorabilia, and your Sticker Collection is a great way to remember your trips! 

To see all your great collectibles, head to the Town screen and click👆 on the sticker collection button on the bottom left of your screen.

Whenever a new Producer or item on your board is created, you'll get a Sticker for your Collection and a cool prize! Just tap on the new item in your Collection to reveal the Sticker and get your reward! 🎁

🌟Top Travel Tips:

1. Play our fun, in-game [Events](https://yourwebsite.com/hc/en-us/articles/6186884031250) to unlock the Collection VIII stickers. Keep in mind that some one-time festival or Event stickers may not be added to your Collection, as they’re only joining you on your excursions temporarily.
2. Keep an eye out on your Collection to see which are still missing Stickers 👀

We hope you enjoy your journey and adding to your collection!

title: What is the Bubble feature?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
We’re glad you asked! Sometimes when you merge items together, a Bubble is created, where you can see a copy of the last item you made.

There are then different ways in which you can burst the bubble (how fun!):

➡️ Watch 👀 an advertisement (keep in mind there’s a daily limit of 3 ads)
➡️ Use Diamonds 💎. When you click on the Bubble, you will see the number of Diamonds you need to pop the Bubble. The amount needed depends on the level of the item inside the Bubble.

If you don't burst the bubble, it will turn into a reward.

⭐ Travel Town Tip: Not enough Diamonds 💎 to burst your Bubble? You can purchase some from our in-store app.

title: What are Orders?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Orders are the main source of rewards and progression in Travel Town and what make the game both exciting and challenging!

At the start of the game, you will only see a single order along with the Daily Challenge. However, once you level up and make some progress this will expand to show three orders at a time.

Each Order will display the item(s) that are requested by the Islander and the reward which can be earned by completing it. By merging the right item on the main Board you will be able to complete them and receive the reward.

You can always check the reward each order gives you right above it and by tapping on each order you will also be able to see the Level of the requested item and the order of merging needed to achieve it.

As you complete orders, new ones will appear with different requests and rewards.

title: What is the Inventory?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
On the bottom-left section of the screen you will find an open chest called an **Inventory**. It will help you keep your Board organized with relevant items, crates, and toolboxes, and give you the opportunity to save the ones you don’t currently need, but are valuable to you and may be useful in the future.

Your inventory is your safe spot. If you feel like you need to expand it, that’s also an option! You can always buy more inventory space by using your Diamonds!

Don’t forget to check your inventory once in a while to see if you have any relevant item or tool that can be useful as you work to complete orders and progress your town!

title: Board Items
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Board items are created in the game by the **Producers**. Tap on a Producer to see its items appear on your Board and get merging!

To merge, simply drag one item onto another and watch as it levels up and transforms. Each item can level up a number of times before reaching its maximum level.

When merging 2 of the same item for the first time, a **Sticker** of that item will be unlocked and appear in your Collections as a gift box. Tap on the gift box to unlock the sticker and receive 1 Diamond 💎 as well!

**Important:**
Some items become new **Producers** as they are merged, so make sure to combine every item to completion. Doing so will also help you complete your sticker collections!

title: How to Sell Items
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1:
Sometimes you might find your Board full and without space to produce items and keep making game progress. If that happens you can do one of two things:

1) Save any valuable items by dragging them into your inventory on the bottom left of the screen - make sure to keep track of the amount of storage space you have as it is limited. More storage slots can be purchased with Diamonds.
2) Sell an item by tapping on it and then on the sell 💲 button on the bottom right of the screen. Each item sold will grant Coins according to its level. First-stage items cannot be sold, however, and those can only be discarded by tapping on them and then on the trash button which appears.

After selling an item, the sell 💲 button will turn into an “Undo” button which can be tapped to return the item to your board at the cost of the Coins received for selling it. Once you continue playing, the undo option will not be available anymore so make sure to keep a close eye on the items you sell or discard!

title: How can I find the Mysterious Letter & Fossil?
author: by Monopoly GO!
des1: Ready for an adventure? Let's unravel the secrets of the elusive Mysterious Fossil. It's a thrilling quest, so get ready! 🕵️
des2:
Follow these steps to uncover the Mysterious Fossil:

1. Locate the Beach Bucket Producer. 🪣
2. Keep using the Beach Bucket, and it'll eventually produce two letters. These are rare, so secure them in your inventory.
3. Once you've gotten both letters, merge them to get a special Island Producer. 🏝️
4. Tap on the Island Producer to get the first half of the fossil. This will unlock a special mystery order.
5. Fulfill the mystery order to get the second piece of the fossil.
6. Combine the two fossil pieces to get the Mysterious Fossil.
7. Complete the Order that needs the Fossil and get your reward! 🎁

So, are you set? It's time to dig deep, discover the Mysterious Fossil, and unlock its secrets. The adventure awaits! 🥳
